title: Dear Tiz
description: Two parallel stories of a fairy tale. The first one starts out in 2008 with Korigan Lacey. The second takes place in the 1850’s with Corianne Kelly. These two seventeen year old girls are connected by family ties as well as some other unusual happenings. A third story, the part that puts the fairy godmother in the fairy tale, is inserted in the middle for the sake of chronological comprehension. Approx: 400 pages – 146.000 wordsAll parts included in this one volume.Please take a peek at the Amazon Sample before buying.This is a Christian Romance.
author: Aslaug Gørbitz
